Class StylizedClipboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • StylizedClipboard
  • class StylizedClipboard
extends java.lang.Object
    A clipboard used by the StylizedTextPane. Sets the system clipboard to plain text on cut or copy. If retrieving data from clipboard inside a StylizedTextPane, the data is returned as characters with their respective AttributeSet A singleton class representing that there exists just one Clipboard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  StylizedClipboard.StylizedCharacter
      A container for the attributes of a styled character
